geo_id.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

geography_name.Description: Census tract name with county and state names
geography_name.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year Simplified Geography Files

rural.Description:
Rural/urban status 
"Rural" indicates tract is wholly contained in a rural area; "Not rural" denotes otherwise.
rural.Source(s): Digital Equity Act definition of "rural areas" applied to 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.

tract_tot_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates, 
2019 Synthetic population.

tot_cov_pop.Description: 2019 Total covered populations in tract (population with 1 or more of the eight characteristics that make up the total covered populations as defined by the Digital Equity Act of 2021)
tot_cov_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.
Small area model of total covered populations derived from 2019 ACS 1-Year file, Vintage 2019 County and Puerto Rico Municipio Population Estimates, 2010 Decennial Census, 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year file, 2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Household file and 2012/2014/2017 PIAAC State and County Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy from the National Education Center for Education Statistics.

pct_tot_cov_pop.Description: 2019 Percentage of tract population in total covered populations
pct_tot_cov_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.

tot_cov_pop_MOE.Description: 2019 Total covered populations in tract (population with 1 or more of the eight characteristics that make up the total covered populations as defined by the Digital Equity Act of 2021) margin of error
tot_cov_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_tot_cov_MOE.Description: 2019 Percentage of tract population in total covered populations margin of error
pct_tot_cov_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

ipr_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract household population in "covered households" (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold)
ipr_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_ipr_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of household population in "covered households" in tract (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold)
pct_ipr_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

ipr_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract household population in "covered households" (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold) margin of error
ipr_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_ipr_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of household population in "covered households" in tract (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold) margin of error
pct_ipr_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level

aging_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population age 60 years and older
aging_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex

pct_aging_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population age 60 years and older
pct_aging_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex

aging_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population age 60 years and older margin of error
aging_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_aging_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population age 60 years and older margin of error
pct_aging_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

incarc_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility
incarc_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_incarc_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility
pct_incarc_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

incarc_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility margin of error
incarc_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_incarc_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility margin of error
pct_incarc_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

vet_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract veteran population age 18 years and older
vet_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table B21001: Sex by Age by Veteran Status for the Civilian Population 18 Years and Over.

pct_vet_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population who are veterans aged 18 years or older
pct_vet_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table B21001: Sex by Age by Veteran Status for the Civilian Population 18 Years and Over.

vet_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract veteran population age 18 years and older margin of error
vet_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table B21001: Sex by Age by Veteran Status for the Civilian Population 18 Years and Over. 
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_vet_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population who are veterans aged 18 years or older margin of error
pct_vet_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level

dis_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population with one or more disabilities
dis_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_dis_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population with one or more disabilities
pct_dis_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

dis_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population with one or more disabilities margin of error
dis_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_dis_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population with one or more disabilities margin of error
pct_dis_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level

lang_barrier_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy)
lang_barrier_pop.Source(s):
Derived from 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year file (for speaks English less than "very well") and 2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Household file and 2012/2014/2017 PIAAC State and County Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy (for low literacy) from the National Center for Education Statistics. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_lang_barrier_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy)
pct_lang_barrier_pop.Source(s): Derived from 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year file (for speaks English less than "very well") and 2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Household file and 2012/2014/2017 PIAAC State and County Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy (for low literacy) from the National Center for Education Statistics

lang_barrier_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy) margin of error
lang_barrier_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
Margin of error accounts for sampling error in the ACS but not the uncertainty introduced by the low literacy imputation.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_lang_barrier_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy) margin of error
pct_lang_barrier_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
Margin of error accounts for sampling error in the ACS but not the uncertainty introduced by the low literacy imputation.

lang_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well"
lang_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home

pct_lang_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well"
pct_lang_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home

lang_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Tract population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well" margin of error
lang_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home. 
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_lang_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well" state margin of error
pct_lang_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

Table DP05: ACS Demographic and Housing Estimates

Digital Equity Act definition of "rural areas" applied to 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.

pct_rural_pop.Source(s): Digital Equity Act definition of "rural areas" applied to 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

pct_rural_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of tract population living in rural areas margin of error
pct_rural_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

Table S2802: Types of Internet Subscriptions by Selected Characteristics
